movies.title: Tapieris
movies.plot: Tapieris ('Piano Player') tells the story of Latvian composer, Oscar Strock, whose tango music was widely known throughout Europe in the 1920's despite Strock himself gaining very little personal fame. His life of failed romance, long-distance travel and constant debt are reflected in his musical compositions.

biography.bio: Marija Berzina is an actress, known for My Family Tree (2013), Ugunsgreks (2009) and Tapieris (2014).
biography.name: Marija Berzina

biography.bio: Andris Bulis is an actor, known for OKI - In the Middle of the Ocean (2014), Kailums (2008) and Dream Team 1935 (2012).
biography.name: Andris Bulis

biography.bio: Gints Gravelis is an actor, known for My Family Tree (2013), Neprata cena (2006) and Latvijas legenda: Bikernieku trase (2015).
biography.name: Gints Gravelis
